name: firefoxos
subtitle: Firefox OS
about: Firefox OS is the new mobile operating system developed by Mozilla, based on Linux and Firefox's powerful Gecko rendering engine.

books.title: Quick Guide For Firefox OS App Development
books.description: Learn how easy and quick it is to develop applications for Firefox OS, the new mobile operating system by Mozilla. Empowered by this books practical approach you will learn thru examples how to develop apps from the beginning all the way to the distribution in the Firefox Markeplace.
books.author: Andre Garzia
books.name: quick_guide_for_firefox_os_app_development

books.title: Building Games for Firefox OS
books.description: Join us in the quest for building games for Firefox OS, the new mobile operating system by Mozilla. Empowered by this books practical approach you will learn thru examples how to develop a full game from the beginning all the way to the distribution in the Firefox Markeplace.
books.author: Andre Garzia
books.name: building_games_for_firefox_os
